p: Collectively, these data reveal the suitability of the final products to be used occasionally as beverages. Moreover, considering the fact that VCH1 increases the cellular viability only in 1BR3 human fibroblasts, whereas VHC2 increases cellular turnover in both tested cell lines (1BR3 and human keratinocytes HaCaT), one can assume that the VHC2 chocolate can be safely administered as topic treatment in skin anti-ageing treatments. The superior effects of VHC2 at skin level could be attributed to the black currant and blueberry components which were previously recommended as the natural antioxidant best choice for foods and health products [ 90].
